original_text: But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth?
korean_text: 악인에게는 하나님이 이르시되 네가 어찌하여 내 율례를 전하며 내 언약을 네 입에 두느냐

sentences.original_text: But unto the wicked God saith
What hast thou to do to declare my statutes
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내 율례를 선포할 무엇을 가졌느냐

sentences.original_text: or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 혹 네가 내 언약을 네 입에 둘 무엇을 가졌느냐
